src:
Hasil Liga Inggris: Bournemouth Kalahkan Manchester United 1-0
02 Nov 2019, 14:25 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Manchester United takluk 0-1 di kandang Bournemouth dalam lanjutan Liga Inggris pekan ke-11 di Vitality Stadium, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Gol tunggal dalam pertandingan itu dicetak oleh Joshua King pada akhir babak pertama.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer mengandalkan Anthony Martial di lini depan timnya, didukung oleh Marcus Rashford, Andreas Pereira, dan Daniel James di belakangnya.
Mereka unggul dalam penguasaan bola, mencapai 52 persen, tapi terlihat kedodoran dalam hal efektivitas penyerangan. Dari sembilan tendangan yang dilakukan MU hanya empat yang terarah ke gawang lawan. Sedangkan Bournemouth mampu mengarahkan lima dari delapan tendangannya.
Hasil ini memastikan MU gagal menjaga kebangkitannya. Di laga sebelumnya mereka mampu mengakhiri empat hasil tanpa kemenangan dengan meraih hasil 3-1 atas Norwich City.
Manchester united kini menempati posisi kedelapan klasemen dengan nilai 13 dari 11 laga. Mereka berada dua tingkat di bawah lawannya yang sudah mengemas nilai 16.
Pada Sabtu malam ini masih ada sejumlah pertandingan menarik pada pekan ke-11 Liga Inggris, termasuk Arsenal vs Wolverhampton, Aston Villa vs Liverpool, dan Manchester City vs Southampton.
text:
Premier League Results: Bournemouth Beat Manchester United 1-0
02 Nov 2019, 14:25 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Manchester United were beaten 0-1 at home to Bournemouth in the English League Week 11 at the Vitality Stadium on Saturday 2 November 2019.
The single goal in the match was scored by Joshua King at the end of the first half.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer relied on Anthony Martial on the front lines of his team, supported by Marcus Rashford, Andreas Pereira, and Daniel James behind him.
They are superior in ball possession, reaching 52 percent, but it looks saggy in terms of the effectiveness of the attack. Of the nine kicks carried by MU only four were directed at the opponent's goal. While Bournemouth is able to direct five of his eight kicks.
These results ensure MU failed to maintain its revival. In the previous match they were able to end four results without a win by reaching a 3-1 result over Norwich City.
Manchester United are now in eighth position with 13 in 11 matches. They are two levels below their opponents who have scored 16.
On Saturday night there are still a number of interesting matches in Week 11 of the English League, including Arsenal vs Wolverhampton, Aston Villa vs. Liverpool, and Manchester City vs. Southampton.
